Sql.query: insert into rer_insumo ( rerinscodi, reravcodi, rerinstipinsumo, rerinstipproceso, rerinslog, rerinsusucreacion, rerinsfeccreacion ) values ( :rerinscodi, :reravcodi, :rerinstipinsumo, :rerinstipproceso, :rerinslog, :rerinsusucreacion, :rerinsfeccreacion )

update rer_insumo set rerinscodi = :rerinscodi, reravcodi = :reravcodi, rerinstipinsumo = :rerinstipinsumo, rerinstipproceso = :rerinstipproceso, rerinslog = :rerinslog, rerinsusucreacion = :rerinsusucreacion, rerinsfeccreacion = :rerinsfeccreacion where rerinscodi = :rerinscodi
select rerinscodi, reravcodi, rerinstipinsumo, rerinstipproceso, rerinslog, rerinsusucreacion, rerinsfeccreacion from rer_insumo order by rerinscodi asc
select rerinscodi, reravcodi, rerinstipinsumo, rerinstipproceso, rerinslog, rerinsusucreacion, rerinsfeccreacion from rer_insumo where rerinscodi = :rerinscodi

select rerinscodi, reravcodi, rerinstipinsumo, rerinstipproceso, rerinslog, rerinsusucreacion, rerinsfeccreacion from rer_insumo where reravcodi = {0} and rerinstipinsumo = '{1}' order by rerinscodi desc
select rerinscodi, reravcodi, rerinstipinsumo, rerinstipproceso, rerinslog, rerinsusucreacion, rerinsfeccreacion from rer_insumo where (-1 = {0} or rerinscodi = {0})
select pmpericodi from pmo_periodo where pmperianiomes = :pmperianiomes
insert into rer_insumo_cm_temp ( rerfecinicio, reretapa, rerbloque, ptomedicodi, ptomedidesc, rervalor ) values ( :rerfecinicio, :reretapa, :rerbloque, :ptomedicodi, :ptomedidesc, :rervalor )
select rerfecinicio, reretapa, rerbloque, ptomedicodi, ptomedidesc, rervalor from rer_insumo_cm_temp order by rerfecinicio, reretapa, rerbloque, ptomedicodi
